name: Junction Chaos
description:
The trains keep separating from their train cars! You need to collect the train cars before the trains hit them. Be careful to not get hit yourself though!

https://liluo.io/games/279fa69c-3d25-49cf-be1e-bfc997950f1d

Controls:

Left and right arrow keys - Switch direction

Up and Down arrow keys - Use angled tracks

Credits:

TheCrd
